ProcessTemplates.Name: Shopify to Salesforce - Orders
ProcessTemplates.Description: This process will retrieve sales orders from Shopify. It will perform the necessary mapping to Salesforce sales order format. Then it will transfer the mapped sales orders to Salesforce.
